definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: mingle, mix, confuse, confound (Ar. bal=a moisten (with water), cf. balalun moisture, As. balâlu, Dl:Pr 70; cf. Ph. [[בלל]] name of a sacrifice, & NH [[בִּלְבֵּל]]; Aram. [[בַּלְבֵּל]], balbel)—
mingle, confuse (obj. [[שָׂפָה]] = speech, language, q.v.) Ge 11:7, Ge 11:9 (J).

mix (cakes or flour, etc. always with oil) term. techn. sacrif., only P (H Le 23:13), cf. Di on Le 2:4; usually as [[מנחה]], ´[[בַּשֶּׁמֶן]] ´[[סׂלֶת בּ]] Ex 29:40, Le 2:5, Le 14:10, Le 14:21, Le 23:13, Nu 7:13, Nu 7:19, Nu 7:25, Nu 7:31, Nu 7:37, Nu 7:43, Nu 7:49, Nu 7:55, Nu 7:61, Nu 7:67, Nu 7:73, Nu 7:79, Nu 8:8, Nu 15:4, Nu 15:6, Nu 15:9, Nu 28:5, Nu 28:9, Nu 28:12, Nu 28:12, Nu 28:13, Nu 28:20, Nu 28:28, Nu 29:3, Nu 23:9, Nu 23:14, ´[[בשׁ]] ´[[מנחה ב]] Le 7:10 (opp. [[חֲרֵבָה]]) Le 9:4, ´[[בשׁ]] ´[[חַלּוֹת מַצּוֹת ב]] Ex 29:2, Le 7:12, Le 7:12, i.e. made by mixing with oil; [[סלת]] ´[[בשׁ]] ´[[חלות מחות ב]] Le 2:4, ´[[בשׁ]] ´[[סלת חלות ב]] Nu 6:15, i.e. fine flour (in the form) of cakes so made. [[בַּ֝לּֽתִּׂי בְּשֶׁמֶן רַעֲנׇן]] Ps 92:11 I shall be (am) anointed with fresh oil AV RV; vb. not elsewhere in this sense; LXX Vulgate Hup Che rd. [[בְּלֽתִי]] fr. [[בלה]], inf. cstr. sf., abstr. for concrete, my wasting = my wasting strength, of declining age; Israel under figure of old man; this however is not favoured by context. The passage is therefore doubtful.

definitions.title: Hithpo.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְבּוֹלָָל]] Ho 7:8; ´[[אפרים בעמים הוא י]] Ephraim, among the peoples doth he mix himself; but Ew Now derive here fr. [[בלל]] = [[בלה]] (or [[נבל]]) waste away, cf. Hiph.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַנׇּ֫בֶל]] Is 64:5 and we faded away, but rd. perh. [[וַנִּכּׂל]] fr. [[נבל]] cf. Di (De, less probably, derives from [[בלל]]—cf. Ew Now Ho 7:8—or [[בול]] = [[נבל]]).
